title: ArtifactDef
description: Extended artifact definition supporting stdout capture

name.description: Artifact identifier, referenced by downstream inject_artifacts

path.description: File path relative to workspace root. Required when source is 'file', ignored when source is 'stdout'

type.description: Content type for validation and handling

required.description: If true, step fails when artifact is missing after execution

source.description: Where artifact content comes from: 'file' (persona writes file) or 'stdout' (captured from process output)

path.description: Ignored for stdout artifacts; path is auto-generated
